instructions: Touch and hold the folder or file. Tap Share the Share button , then tap Add People. Do one of the following: Allow only invitees to view and edit the contents: Tap Share Options, tap Only people you invite, tap Can make changes, then choose a method such as Messages or Mail for sending people a link to the folder or file. Allow only invitees to view the contents: Tap Share Options, tap Only people you invite, tap View only, then choose a method for sending the link. Allow anyone with the link to view and edit the contents: Tap Share Options, tap Anyone with the link, tap Can make changes, then choose a method for sending the link. Allow anyone with the link to view the contents: Tap Share Options, tap Anyone with the link, tap View only, then choose a method for sending the link. Choose how you want to send your invitation, then tap Send.

Touch and hold the folder or file. Tap Share the Share button , then tap Show People. Tap Add People and choose a method for sending the link. Enter any other requested information, then send or post the invitation.

Touch and hold the folder or file. Tap Share the Share button , tap Show People, then tap Send Link. Choose a method for sending the link, enter any other requested information, then send or post the invitation.

Touch and hold the folder or file. Tap Share the Share button , tap Show People, then tap Share Options. Change either or both of the options. Access option: When you change the access option from Anyone with the link to Only people you invite, the original link no longer works for anyone, and only people who receive a new invitation from you can open the folder or file. Permission option: When you change the permission option, everyone who has the file open when you change the permission sees an alert. New settings take effect when the alert is dismissed.
Touch and hold the folder or file. Tap Share the Share button , then tap Show People. Tap the person s name, then select an option.
Touch and hold the folder or file. Tap Share the Share button , then tap Show People. Tap Stop Sharing.

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the MORE or Menu icon. Tap Settings . Tap Chat settings . Select the following options to modify your settings: Send read receipt (ON/OFF) Multimedia limit Automatically accept all Automatically accept files less than 3000 MB in size Roaming auto download (ON/OFF) Image size Best available Original Large (50%) Medium (20%) Small (10%) Share typing indications (ON/OFF)
From any Home screen, tap Phone . Tap the MORE or Menu icon. Tap Settings . Tap Voice over LTE settings . Select one of the following: Turn on: Use VoLTE when available Turn off: Do not use VoLTE
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Move the slider for Voice over LTE preferred to On or Off.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap More connection settings . Tap Wi-Fi Calling . Slide the Wi-Fi Switch right to the ON position. Select the Wi-Fi preferred or Never use Cellular Network to turn on Wi-Fi calling.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap Connections . Tap More connection settings . Tap Wi-Fi Calling . Slide the Wi-Fi Switch right to the ON position. Select the Wi-Fi preferred or Never use Cellular Network to turn on Wi-Fi calling.
